movie.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
movie.plot: The Fantastic Mr. Fox bored with his current life, plans a heist against the three local farmers. The farmers, tired of sharing their chickens with the sly fox, seek revenge against him and his family.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 32 wins & 61 nominations.
